Patent Information.Patent Title: Long-lasting antiviral fusion inhibitor peptide conjugates comprising albumin and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) peptides.
Patent Information.Abstract: Peptides exhibiting anti-viral and anti-fusogenic activity are modified to provide greater stability and improved half-life in vivo. The selected peptides include fusion inhibitors DP178 and DP107 and related peptides and analogs thereof. The modified peptides are capable of forming covalent bonds with one or more blood components, preferably a mobile blood component.
